>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You can produce a pyrotechnic display with your weapon that elicits a primal fear of fire. For your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{Debilitating Trick (Ex)}, whenever you are using a weapon that deals fire damage or has the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.O5GDQUKPCJ9Zbnfj.JournalEntryPage.zOJ86MDq6kNzAAbB#burn]{Burn} critical hit effect, your target must succeed at a Will save. If they fail, they become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} and run away for 1 round. Creatures that are resistant or immune to fire damage gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their Will saves against this exploit, but those with vulnerability to fire instead take a â€“2 penalty to saves against this exploit.
